para.text: This tab allows you to see and edit all the code of the TOC template manually. Experience in editing HTML code is necessary for using this mode! Note
that the code in this template is essential for the proper functioning of the TOC. Please don't change or delete anything that you don't fully understand!
switch back to the Simple tab after editing the source code! Doing so will reset the standard template and delete all your edits!
